talents.option2: +12 Strength per hero hit with Reverse Polarity

abilities.desc: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line, pulling them towards him and slowing them for a brief period.
abilities.name: Shockwave

abilities.desc: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack. Magnus receives 75.0% larger bonus.
abilities.name: Empower

abilities.desc: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk. Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and affected by slowed movement and attack speed.
abilities.name: Skewer

abilities.desc: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies take damage, spend 0.6 seconds in the air, and then are heavily slowed upon landing.
abilities.name: Horn Toss

abilities.desc: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
abilities.name: Reverse Polarity
